tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well I did have an intense dental treatment with them . The entire dental journey was a joyful treat . The very first time I approached boosted my confidence to go for the entire treatment right away at the spur . The expertise and confidence with which they treated me was excellent . All my frontal caps had been replaced do good that they look so natural . They polished my smile 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is really sweet. Even though i had to remove my wisdom tooth he made sure that the pain was minimum. Trust him with your teeth. Also very smooth with surgeries. The clinic is really clean and neat. I love the couches. Must visit for any Dental problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mohit was very pleasant, friendly in his approach. He explained the issues and suggested the precautions in a realistic way. He was very smooth with his treatment process and did not cause any discomfort. He seems to be a very good dentist and I was impressed even if it was my first time. Thank you Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Let me describe this in one word first the experience was so HAPPY. From entering the clinic and carrying all those myths of the process of root Canal or cavity filling or injections being painful went off as soon as I was here. Dr.Mohit is so experienced and passionate about this, he says it's his thing.  To take my worries aways he played Arijit Singh songs and most importantly being patient with my nervousness. Who knew A tooth decay correction could be such a happy story. The injections are painless believe me if Dr.Mohit is giving it. I have found my dentist. Find yours here too. Special mention to how sweet Dr.Shaily Is.

PS. He loves Biggboss.🙋
